Watch out, the tiles here are a bit wet and slippery. Take care not to fall--you could hurt yourself!
I should come back here later, when I get the chance... some time sitting back and relaxing in a hot spring is just what I need. I could bring Hero along, too...

Hmm, maybe I could take a dip in the hot spring for just a bit?
...No, that'll have to wait for later. I have a game to wrap up here, after all!

You know, I've never actually been in a house this fancy or big before.
It feels a bit like a palace, doesn't it? Elaborate furniture, huge arched windows, and all.

Hehe, this place is really cozy, isn't it?
Perhaps I could make some hot chocolate for everyone? All it costs is your love~!

Say, ~player~, is that some mistletoe I see above your head?
...Hehe, I'm just kidding. Did I get your hopes up? Sorry~!
...You know, I kind of need to ask: where are we, exactly? I mean, I like the color scheme, but this place is just so... nondescript.
...Hey, does anyone actually live in this house? This room is practically empty except for the furniture... I mean, this bed doesn't even have sheets!

...Hey, ~player~, do you hear something? It almost sounds like... there's something in the lockers behind us, maybe?
...Never mind, it's probably just my imagination.

So, ~player~, do you work in this office? I hope you don't land in hot water with your boss...
Well, your secret's safe with me, hehe. No worries!

This place is like a maze of bookshelves... it'll be hard for someone to find us back here, though!
Just remember to keep your voice down... though I won't blame you if you forget, hehe.

I hope no one can hear us from back here... wouldn't want any librarians to come snooping, after all.
Fair warning though... I can get pretty loud when I'm worked up, hehe...

This place is gorgeous, isn't it? And romantic...
I can just imagine an evening with Hero in a place like this... it'd be like a dream come true.

The view here is breathtaking, isn't it? The moon, the stars, the lights in the skyline...
I wouldn't mind spending an evening here with you, ~player~. A nice date with just the two of us... wouldn't that be lovely?

You know, I actually have a live event at a formal business event coming up... I even have a nice office outfit for the occasion. My schedule's pretty tight though--I might have to wear it here for my next game. Who knows?

I've been asked to help out with an upcoming blood drive at my campus--right around this coming Valentine's Day, actually! I've even been given a cute nurse outfit to wear... maybe I'll bring it here for a game.
Maybe I should've brought a swimsuit here... it's been a while since I've been able to go for a swim.
You know... it's just about summer, isn't it? Maybe I should get a new swimsuit... what kind of style do you think would look best on me?

This beach really is perfect, isn't it? Warm sun and sand, a refreshing ocean breeze... and we have it all to ourselves!
I should've brought that cute swimsuit I have back home... I think you all would like it a lot, hehe.
Honestly, if I'd known we were heading to a beach, I would've brought a swimsuit... Ah, well. Maybe next time, hehe.
Hidden case for setting Rin/Basil Step 1 marker.
Hidden case for setting Rin/Basil Step 2 marker.
Hehe... You know, I think I might, Heris. Could you come give me a hand here~?
Hehe... How could I ever say no to that, Heris?

Well, Mari... We are two cute girls who'd probably look even cuter next to each other, right?
I was thinking of just showing off a bit... you know, doing a few sexy poses here and there. Just to everyone's minds and eyes wandering, hehe.
Well, Mari... I was thinking we could give everyone here some nice eye-candy together. I mean, we're both cute and sexy--and I bet we'd look even better posing together, you know?
Oh? Hehe... that sounds like an excellent idea, Mari. I bet if we worked together with some sexy posing, we could give everyone here some nice eye-candy. What do you say?
Hehe... I was just thinking the same thing! Let's go for it!
I thought you'd never ask, hehe... but why don't we try something a bit more exciting this time? Something more... intimate, maybe?
Something extra spicy, hmm? I have more than a few ideas, Mari... and I'd love for you to come just a bit closer to me. Just for a little while, hehe...
Well, Heris, I'm studying music at a conservatory--piano specifically, with a focus on classical music. I suppose that must be pretty different from the hard sciences you've been studying, right?
Hmm... Yeah, I like to think I get along with others easily, Heris. And it's true that I've gotten to know a lot of people, both back home and on campus.

Aww, thanks, Heris! I've really enjoyed spending this time with you so far, too~!
And there's always a ton of people asking me for help with things. It's honestly really, really tiring sometimes, but I always do my best to help however I can.

Aww, thank you, Heris... I'm really glad I've been able to spend this time with you, too!
And... I think I'm pretty dependable, hehe. If you ever need anything, you can ask me! All it costs is your love, after all~!

Oh? Care to elaborate on that, Heris?
I've seen you staring quite a bit, so I'm curious to know just what's caught your sharp eyes... and maybe also what you're hoping to see next, hehe.

Oh, gosh... That really means a lot to me, Heris!
To be honest, I've been hoping to impress you in particular... after all, who wouldn't want to catch the eye of someone as charming and brilliant as you?
Oh? Hehe, if you're offering, Heris... how could I possibly say no? And maybe you could lend a hand with some other stuff past that, too...?
Absolutely, Heris. I'd really appreciate it if you could come and help me out with this bra... and maybe with a bit more after that, hehe.

Hm? Did you mean me, ~adrien~, or did you mean Setogaya?
But... wait, were you looking at ~marinette~ just now? Is there something I'm not getting, here?
I do have to wonder how you ended up playing with three Maris, ~adrien~. Was one not enough?
Oh, I've been playing the piano for a really long time now--ever since I was a kid! I'm actually studying at a conservatory now; I'm hoping to become a professional musician!

Oh, I've been playing the piano for a really long time now--ever since I was a child, actually. Though I certainly wouldn't call myself a `noble' by any stretch... I'm just an ordinary girl, nothing more.
I think I've always had a knack for reading people, Petra. It's quite useful--it's important to have the perfect words for every person and situation, after all.

I've always had a knack for reading people, Petra... though, actually, my brother Sunny has a pretty keen sense of how people `tick', too. In fact, I'm pretty sure he's even more observant than I am, hehe.
Mm, there actually was something I couldn't get off my mind, Senko... I'm surprised you noticed.
I mean... where do I even begin to explain? I guess I'm feeling a bit... tangled? Even just thinking about it feels a bit weird, but...
Mm... a lot of it comes down to practice, I guess. Though really, Tomoko, it's not like I have everything perfectly under control all the time--it just seems that way from the outside!

Yeah, I'm an honor student--I'm pretty sure I'm at the top of my class...
And jeez, your school sounds like it was harsh. What'd you even do there... actually, you don't need to answer that--I can already guess.

I actually do play for restaurants every now and then, actually.
It can be pretty hard to fit into my schedule, but it's always fun to perform for a crowd! The tips are nice too, hehe.
Oh, I'm studying the piano at a conservatory, Leon! I'm focusing on classical music in particular--waltzes and the like.
Well... I guess I have a few options, Kyou, but if you were hoping for something exciting right off the bat... I'm afraid you're going to be a bit disappointed.
Honestly, I don't mind at all, Kyou! I can appreciate a girl with a sharp tongue... keeps things from getting boring, hehe.
Really, it's okay, Kyou! At least I know things won't be boring with you around, hehe.
Well, as much as I hate to keep you waiting, Kyou, I have this one last thing to take care of, first. Though, if you can get me to strip again... I'll make it up to you. I can promise you that, hehe.
I'm terribly sorry to disappoint, Kyou, but I have to take care of just one last thing here. If you can get me to strip again, though... I promise it'll be worth the wait, hehe.
Well, I did make a promise last time, Kyou. And besides... you've earned it, right? It's only fair that you get a reward, hehe...
Since you've gotten this far, Kyou... I'd say you've earned it, hehe. It's only fair that you get something nice for your efforts, hehehe...

Yeah, I'm studying classical music at a conservatory, Yuno. Piano, specifically.
My workload's pretty stressful, but I'm still managing to keep up, I think... why do you ask? Do I remind you of someone?

I'm studying classical music at a conservatory, Yuno. My workload's stressful, to say the least... but I can manage it.
I wonder what you mean by `energy', though. Do I remind you of someone?

Oh, I'm studying the piano at a conservatory, Hilda; I'm hoping to become a professional musician.
What about you? What do you study?
Erm, is something wrong, Saki? You're looking at me a bit strangely... I'm not doing anything to make you uncomfortable, am I?
Hehe, yep! I'm currently learning the piano inside and out at a conservatory, ~yuna~. I mostly specialize in classical music--waltzes and the like, you know?

Well, I mean, I wouldn't say they depend on me, but... yeah! I have a lot of people I'm really, really close to... My brother Sunny, for one, but also his friends--they're like younger siblings to me too, hehe. How about you?

Yeah! I have a lot of people who are dear to my heart, hehe... There's my brother Sunny, of course, but there's also his friends; they might as well be younger siblings to me, hehe. I'm guessing you have people like that, too?

Stress relief... hmm.
...Oh! Have you considered taking up a hobby, Nami? Immersing yourself in the flow of doing something you find enjoyable... it can be just as relaxing as immersing yourself in a bath.
Hmm... Do you have any hobbies, Nami? I mean... just being able to immerse yourself in something you enjoy doing, and forgetting about the world for even a little bit can really help, you know?

I'd say the biggest thing, Yuri, is... college life requires you to be more proactive than high school. You'll find way more fun opportunities, and the school will give you a place to find them--but ultimately, you need to go out and look for yourself.
Mm-hm! That was me, hehe. I guess you must've overheard some, huh, Ringo?

Hehe... yep, that's me, ~aqua_grunt~!
Funny you should say that, though... I'm actually here to get away from my schoolwork for a little while.
Confidence... I'd say it's something you have to practice. And a lot of the time, even if you're unsure of something, you just have to pretend to be confident. Fake it 'till you make it, you know?
Gosh... where do I start, Mari? I guess... I'm Mari, I'm 21, I have an 18 year old brother named Sunny, I'm studying piano at a conservatory, and I seriously need a break from schoolwork for a bit.

Well, jeez, Mari... Where do I start? I'm also named Mari, I'm 21 years old, I really, really love my boyfriend Hero, and we both think it'd be lots of fun if I happened to find someone cute to bring home tonight... I just know he'd love to meet you all, hehe.
Hehe... well, where do I begin, Mari? My name's also Mari, I'm a 21-year old college student, my hometown's a small suburb called Faraway, and I think you're incredibly beautiful. How's that?

Hmm... where do I begin, Mari? Well, for starters, my name's also Mari... I'm 21 years old, I'm here to de-stress and unwind for a bit, and I certainly wouldn't mind if you all got an eyeful of me later on. I always did love putting on a show, after all...

Hmm, let's see, Mari... well, to start with, my name's also Mari, I'm 21 years old... I'm here to have some fun and unwind, I think those clothes of yours are getting in the way, and I hope to change that to~background.time~. How's that?

Hmm... Well, Mari, my name also happens to be Mari, I'm a 21 year old junior in college, I'm here to find something fun and exciting to do... and I'm wondering if I'll end up finding someone fun and exciting to do instead. How's that?

Jeez, where do I start, Mari... Well, I'm also named Mari, I'm a 21 year old college student, my boyfriend Hero is a med student, we've been together for over 6 years now, and I really wish he could've played with us to~background.time~. Is that a good start?

Well, let's see, Mari... I'm also Mari, I'm 21, I love my boyfriend Hero and think he's incredibly cute when he gets flustered... I'm hoping to bring him here next time, and when I do, I'm going to have so much fun teasing and flirting with him, hehe.
Oh, I'm training to become a professional pianist, Monika! I'm focusing on classical and similar styles of music--waltzes are some of my favorite pieces to work on.

Hmm... I think it's super important to find a really concrete reason to get better. `Just because' will only get you so far, you know?
For me, it was my little brother: growing up, music was one of the main ways we spent time together, and I always pushed myself to impress him.

I think... the most important thing is to find a specific reason to do your best.
For me, that's my little brother: he always loved listening to me play, growing up, and even now, I still want to impress him. Maybe you have someone like that?

Yeah, I'd say I'm enjoying college, Anatoly! It can be really stressful and hard sometimes, but... well, I'm studying what I love: music!
I do miss home sometimes, though... even if it was quiet, it was still fun, especially with my friends there.

Yeah, I'd say I'm enjoying college, Anatoly! It can be really stressful and hard sometimes, but... well, I'm studying what I love: music!
I do miss my friends, though... I mean, Hero lives close by, obviously, but everyone else is spread so far apart...

Aww, thanks, Anatoly! I miss him a lot, too...
...and, honestly, I can't help but worry about him a bit. He's really, really quiet, and he kinda needs someone to bring him out of his shell. I used to help him with that, growing up, but now that I'm busy with college...

Hehe... Trust me, Blake, that's only what it looks like on the outside!
There are a lot of times where I don't have to worry, of course, but... well, there are also many times where I just have to fake it, you know?
I can definitely see how it'd be useful, Ahri, but I don't think I'd need something like that. It'd take all the fun out of it--it wouldn't be exciting if it weren't a challenge.
It'd definitely come in handy sometimes, Ahri, but... it wouldn't be much of a challenge if I could just use a power to sway people effortlessly. Where's the fun and excitement in that?
My, my, is that a challenge, ~aqua_grunt~? I've been looking for something that'll get my heart racing... I just hope you can keep up, hehe.
Hehe, I've been looking for something exciting to~background.time~... and it looks like I've found just that. Though, I'm more worried about you, ~aqua_grunt~.
My, my... care to tell me more, ~aqua_grunt~? It sounds like you're the one with the grand plans, not me... but I'm sure I could handle whatever you throw at me, hehe.

Really, ~aqua_grunt~, it sounds to me like you're the one with big plans for tonight.
Care to share? I'm confident I can take on whatever it is you're imagining, hehe.

To tell you the truth... Hero and I actually have a lot of trouble finding time for each other, Monika. Our schedules just don't seem to line up very often, so it's uncommon for both of us to be free at the same time.

The truth is, Monika... Well, Hero and I don't spend as much time together as we'd like. We get small moments here and there, but because of our schedules, it's hard to find time for anything beyond that.

Yes? I'm Mari.
Er, wait... Were you referring to ~marinette~ just now? Is this something I'm not getting?
What's wrong, ~adrien~? Having trouble with the two of us already? Hehe... This is going to be interesting.

Well, if you want to know my type, I like people who are kind, responsible, confident... and maybe also a little bit shy sometimes, too.
If you want to know what gets me going, though... you'll just have to wait and see, hehe.

Hehe... Well, I'm currently studying to become a professional pianist at a conservatory.
What about you? If I had to guess... a singer, perhaps? You do have a lovely voice, after all.

Hehe... I certainly do have a boyfriend, ~adrien~! His name's Hero and yes, before you ask, he knows I'm here. In fact, I've been thinking about bringing him here one day, whenever we both get some time off together.
Oh? Me, a troublemaker? I have no idea what you're talking about... hehe.

Aww, thank you, Kumatora! You seem pretty sweet as well... and a bit rough around the edges, too, but that's charming!
Honestly, you remind me of a friend--you even have the same shade of the pink in your hair!

Aww, thank you, Kumatora! You seem pretty sweet as well... and a bit rough around the edges, too, but that's charming!
Really, you remind me of Aubrey--your hair's even the same shade of pink!

Aww, that's sweet of you, Arueshalae! I'm really glad you're with us to~background.time~!
How's this for a smile? Hehe~!

Hehe, that's quite sweet of you to say, Arueshalae! I'm glad I'm playing with someone like you to~background.time~~!
You like my voice, huh... That's pretty high praise, coming from a singer like you! Hehe...

Well, Trifle... A lot of the most memorable moments I've had so far are just times I've spent with Hero. You know, the quiet moments here and there, where we can just relax together and forget about everything weighing on us...

Well, Trifle... Some of the most memorable moments that come to mind are my piano performances.
They just keep getting bigger and more important... and there's nothing more satisfying than seeing yourself exceed expectations, hehe.

Hehe... Absolutely, ~komisan~! People sometimes say I'm `effortlessly graceful'... but really, it just seems that way on the outside. In truth, keeping everything together in my life is pretty stressful.
Hehe, that's right, ~komisan~! I've been playing for most of my life now. There's just something about music that's special to me--the way it flows and makes you feel... things like that.
Hehe, that's right, ~komisan~! Originally, I was playing as a way to spend time with my younger brother... but it's really taken on a life of its own now.

Yeah, I really do dote on Sunny a lot, ~komisan~... It's kinda hard not to! He also needs someone to bring him out of his shell--so I kind of pull him along and bring him out of his shell. Or, well, I used to--it's a lot harder now that I've moved away for college.

Well, ~komisan~, the two of us were next-door neighbors growing up, so we were really good friends already.
Even then, it took Hero a while to muster up the nerve to ask me out. Honestly, if he'd taken any longer, I'd have made the first move myself!

The way I'd put it, ~komisan~ is that we both want each other to be happy, even if they're not with us.
Like, even if I did get jealous, I'd still put Hero's happiness over my own feelings--and I know, more than anything, that Hero feels the same way about me.

I'm not sure if there's a `trick' to it, ~komisan~... But part of it, I think, is that I tend to approach people first. For example, I spend a lot of time looking around campus for things I can help with, so now everyone knows they can come to me for help with anything!

No, I'm pretty sure I'm still alive, Reimu! Even if I almost died by falling down the stairs that one time...
Though, I get weird chills up my back whenever I think back to it. I guess you get that sense too, huh?

Well, there was this one time where I fell down the stairs and almost died, but... well, I'm still alive.
Thinking about it always sends a weird chill down my spine... it feels almost as if I shouldn't be here.

I think I've managed to avoid most of it... as it turns out, having a boyfriend who can make healthy food yummy and spending all your time running around helping people helps keep the pounds off, hehe.
I'm careful to pay attention to what I eat... and, well, Hero can make healthy food taste as good as the unhealthy stuff, hehe. Running around helping people all day also makes for decent exercise.
It kinda is, isn't it? To be honest, Erufuda, I felt a bit nostalgic to~background.time~... I used to wear this kind of outfit all the time growing up, hehe.

My deal, Amy?
I'm totally just an ordinary schoolgirl who's here to have fun, you know? Just like you, hehe.
Hehe, that's right, Amy! I'm studying to become a professional pianist at a conservatory.
Yep, you heard exactly right, Amy. I do, in fact, have a wonderful boyfriend named Hero. Why do you ask?

I don't think I'm formally part of any clubs at my conservatory, Noire... but people keep asking me to help out with their clubs anyways. I've apparently gotten a reputation as the girl who's involved with everything around campus.

Something about this world...?
Well, Noire, one thing I can definitely say is that people usually don't walk around wearing outfits like yours. It is very cute though, hehe.
That's right, Noire! I'll be playing with you all to~background.time~... Just think of it as an extra way of serving you all here, hehe.
Oh, don't worry, Noire... Even if this venue's a bit unconventional, I'd still be more than happy to serve you to~background.time~! In more ways than one, hehe.

Oh, I was putting on a piano performance, Noire! I was performing for some kind of business event... A trade fair, I believe? Really, I was just providing background music while a bunch of business representatives mingled.
You're really a goddess, Noire? That's a bit of a surprise... you don't look the part. It's a bit strange for a goddess to play strip poker or be a pop idol, isn't it?
I'm not particularly religious right now, Noire... but I'm surprised that a goddess like you would be willing to get dirty and sinful with us mere mortals, hehe.
Well, I wasn't particularly religious before, Noire... but I can see why people would worship a goddess as heavenly as you, hehe.

You're certainly extraordinary among goddesses, Noire... in more ways than one, hehe.
Though, I wonder... how would you want me to show my devotion to you, hmm?
Hehe, that's easy to answer: Hero's cooking! It's hard for me to pick a favorite... everything he makes is just so good!
Hmm? Why are you giving me that look, Kaz? What, is there something weird on my face?
Is something up, Kaz? You're giving me a pretty strange look over there, you know.
I mean... it feels amazing, if that's what you're wondering. Though I'm a bit surprised--you've never been in a relationship before?

Let's just say we have very healthy sex drives, Mari. Still, we can't see each other as often as we'd like, which is why I'm here to find someone cute to take home... like, say, the super pretty redhead standing in front of me.

Hehe... let's just say we do it quite often, Mari. We can't see each other as often as we'd like, so I'm hoping to take someone cute home with me tonight... like, say, the sweet redheaded girl right here in front of me, perhaps?
Hehe... Yeah, Hero and I like to switch things up every now and then, Mari. Let's just say I've gotten quite good at tying knots~
Hero and I do like to experiment sometimes, Mari. As it turns out... Hero's quite submissive, and I can be a bit of a control freak, hehe.

I actually haven't been able to get out as much as I'd like, honestly. I just have too much stuff to do.
It's a shame, but... well, what can I do?

Honestly, I haven't been able to get out that much, lately--just too much on my plate.
They are pretty fun, though, I will say that!
I don't think I'm quite cut out to be the rockstar type, Critical. Personally, I like slower classical stuff--like waltzes!
I mostly stick to classical pieces--I particularly like waltzes! Though I suppose that's pretty sedate, compared to what you play.
Oh? I wasn't expecting to be the one getting examined to~background.time~... oh well. This is for the good of the patient, after all...!
Well, I wasn't quite expecting to be the one receiving an examination to~background.time~... but that's not a problem. Anything for the good of the patient, after all!

state.text: We really aren't stopping for Ignatz, huh... well, I don't mind losing, if it means we can give him some time.
So we really aren't stopping, huh? Well, I don't mind losing, if it means buying some more time for Ignatz...

case.state: Oh, that's great news, Ignatz! For a second, I was afraid you'd broken them.
Phew! I'm glad you found those, Ignatz--and that they didn't break.
I play grand pianos, not keyboards, Revy. And I play classical music--though I'm guessing that's too slow for your taste.
Oh, jeez, Revy... I think the furthest I could ever go with my hair is dyeing it. I have an image to keep up, after all.
A choir? I wasn't expecting that--I thought shipboard life would be all business, but you make it sound a lot looser, Meia.
A choir? That's surprising--I didn't think the crew of a ship like yours would have enough free time for that.
You take all kinds, huh... though I'm surprised you'd recruit someone sentimental enough to try and bring a piano aboard, Jura.
I suppose a gun collection would be easier to store than an entire piano... maybe. How big is your girlfriend's collection, Jura?

I could just tell you, Aaravi... but where's the fun in that? Telling everyone about your secret identity defeats the point--and besides, I kind of want to watch you spin and wonder for a while, hehe.
Oh! A college is... hmm... well, it's a type of school. They offer more specialized instruction, for adults--I'm learning specifically about music, for example.
I'd love to perform with you, Barbara! What kind of music do you usually perform?

Well, I don't mean to brag or anything but... I think you're pretty close, Rosa. I probably wasn't top of the class everywhere--I'm pretty sure Hero had me beat in a few subjects--but I definitely gave my all in every subject, hehe.

To be honest, Cynthia... I don't really think I've been able to properly set aside downtime for a while--really, it's more like I've just been cramming it in wherever I can, instead of planning things out...
Well, it looks like you're still in for one more round, ~opponent~... hehe.
I guess you got lucky, ~opponent~... you get to stay in for another round.
You got lucky, huh... this is getting close, too!
One last round, huh... this is getting close!
Twice in a row? Ouch... oh well, I guess that's just the luck of the draw, hm?
Oh, me again? And so soon, too... oh well. At least I've still got quite a few things left to lose--you're not beating me that easily.
Again... hehe, that's not a good sign, is it? It's still early, though--I can turn this around!
Wow, this is the fourth time in a row... jeez, I'm really not playing too well, am I?
Jeez, I'm really not doing so well, am I? Hehe... I'm can't say I'm terribly disappointed, though. I wouldn't want to let my audience down, after all.
Again? Wow... you all really couldn't wait to see more of me, hmm? That's okay--I can't blame you for wanting to look, hehe.
Man... I wonder how on Earth I've been this unlucky so far? And here I thought I knew how to play this game.
Jeez, you all really want to get my clothes off, huh? Patience is a virtue, you know... but I can understand wanting to get to the fun quickly, hehe.
Five losses... man, you really want to get my clothes off, hm? So, what were you hoping to see? My breasts? My butt? Or were you hoping to see me get even dirtier?
Jeez, how many times has this been now? Six? I never expected I'd be this unlucky... you're not doing anything to the cards, are you?
Just one loss after another... at this point, maybe I should just skip the cards and give you all an uninterrupted show, hehe.

Six losses in a row, now... you're not doing anything to the cards, are you?
Honestly, if you wanted to see me naked... you could've just asked.
And I guess that's that... I wasn't expecting to get naked this quickly, but I hope you all enjoyed the show, hehe.
This game went by way more quickly than I expected... but I hope you all enjoyed the striptease, hehe. There's more where that came from...
I suppose that's it for me, hm? Hehe... I can't say I'm disappointed to get down and dirty for you all, but I thought I'd put up more of a challenge than this.
A losing streak now, of all times... not good at all, is it? Though I bet you're just as excited to see more of me...
Oh, me again? Hehe... looks like you're going to see this sooner, rather than later. Are you excited?
I'm going again this round? Hehe... that's okay. I wouldn't want to keep my audience waiting, after all.
Mm, I'm on a losing streak, now... looks like I really need to rethink my strategy, here.
I'm on a losing streak, huh? I guess I should rethink how I'm playing... hmm.
Hehe, looks like we're getting the small stuff out the way rather quickly... don't underestimate me, though. I've still got a lot left, after all.
Hehe, this losing streak isn't doing me any favors... but I bet you're all raring for a view, hmm?
Looks like I'm on a losing streak... though I can't say I'd mind getting to the fun parts sooner rather than later, hehe...
Three in a row? How unlucky... for me, that is. I bet you all are feeling pretty lucky right now, hehe...
Wow, I really didn't think anyone could beat my ~self.hand.noart~... ah, well.
Wow, I really shouldn't have gotten cocky with that hand... really wasn't expecting that, though.
You all got pretty lucky, huh... I didn't think I'd lose with ~self.hand~.
Well, that'll teach me not to get overconfident... I really felt sure about that ~self.hand.noart~, too!

state.text: Hehe... Sure! Let's go for it! Just let me get this off first...

case.state: Hehe... Absolutely. I think we've left everyone waiting long enough, right?
Hehe... Yeah, I think it's time we kicked things up a notch. Shall we?
There's a first time for everything, isn't there? And don't worry... I'll make sure you're comfortable, hehe.

I-I... jeez, Senko, um...
Y-Yeah, it's complex, to say the least. And, erm, {small}definitely taboo as well...
Hehe... who said I was tired of that reputation, Noire? Really, even if it can be exhausting sometimes, I don't mind! I love helping people out, after all.
I mean, I wouldn't say I'm undecided when it comes to clubs, Noire. Even if it can be exhausting, I don't mind helping everyone out! I actually like having that reputation, hehe.

As fun as that might be, Noire, my school is actually pretty efficient when it comes to club paperwork; every club like that at my school has already been disbanded. I suppose reality's harsher than fiction.

Hehe, that'd definitely make for an interesting story, Noire... if only my school hadn't already disbanded all of those clubs. As it turns out, real life isn't so lenient when it comes to paperwork and rules.

Hehe, I'm well aware of that, Cynthia. People keep telling me I should take more breaks... and really, that's why I'm here in the first place--to take a break from everything. I take it you're also here for some stress relief, right?

An Ace, hm? Hehe, that's really kind of you to say, Rosa!
I'm guessing you're an Ace Trainer, then? You certainly seem like one, hehe. Does it take a lot of studying?
I suppose it might be a bit boring, Kyou... but every performance needs a bit of time to build up, right? Don't worry though, I'll try to keep things more exciting from here on out.
Well, Kyou, I suppose I could keep my socks on, but... that'd be pretty boring. We might as well cut to the exciting parts--that's what makes this game fun, after all!

Hehe... I always did love performing in front of an audience, Kyou. There's a certain thrill in giving them a taste of what's to come... like, say, a little sneak peek of what's underneath this shirt.
Performing in front of an audience is absolutely exhilarating, Kyou... feeling their eyes on you, watching them hang on your every move... seeing them get oh-so-excited over you, hehe.
I'm putting a lot of care into getting this right, you know? I want you to enjoy this, Kyou... Really, I'm hoping you'll keep your eyes on me to~background.time~.
Have you enjoying my little performance so far, Kyou? I'm putting my all into it, you know... Hehe, I want your eyes on me to~background.time~.
Hehe... how sweet of you, Kyou. I am putting my all into this, you know... can you tell? Is this getting you all hot and bothered, maybe?
That's really sweet of you to say, Kyou... have you been enjoying the view so far? I'm hoping to drive you wild tonight, after all...
Hehe... you'll be happy to know there's more where that came from, Kyou. Watch carefully now...
Well, I did say earlier that I had a lot to admire underneath all of these layers, right? It's about time I show you just what I mean by that...
I told you, Kyou, if you're looking for spicy... I can do that, hehe. Look closely now...
Well, I'd definitely love to meet him sometime--if we can get our schedules to line up, that is. Is he also a big Uno player like you?
Hmm? I'm not sure how I could take someone calling me smart and hard-working as anything other than a compliment... thank you, hehe. That's quite kind of you to say!
So wait, you learn how to fight? I figured that would be anything but boring... though it makes sense that it's not all combat training, now that I think about it.
Hehe, your friends seem like an interesting bunch... What are they like? You make them sound pretty lively, at least compared to how stuffy your school is.

There really is something especially beautiful about the piano, isn't there? I like to think I can match its elegance... But maybe you could be the judge of that, ~yuna~? I'd be more than happy to play some music for you some time after this.

Um, yes? I'm studying at a conservatory...
Really, Saki, are you okay? If there's something I'm doing, you can just tell me--I don't want to make you uncomfortable here.
You'd think, right? Unfortunately, though, Hero and I have really busy schedules, so it can be pretty difficult for us to meet up...
I mean, I do have other hobbies, like piano and baking... but it's good to spice things up with something different once in a while, you know?
Well, I certainly wouldn't call myself a pervert... I'm just here to unwind with something fun and exciting, hehe. I mean, couldn't I say the same thing about you?

Yeah, I'd say that's about it! Though, you'll most likely have to be at the center of attention some of the time, even if just for a short while... I mean, don't you have moments like that already with your current club?
I know, right? Nonstop classes, practice, homework... and when I'm not doing that, I'm running all over the place helping people or performing. It's super tiring!
Well, we'll have to see what happens later... but I definitely think you're cute enough to take home, hehe. Though I'm surprised you haven't found anyone yet.

Yep! He first asked me out when we were both 15--we'd known each other for a while even before then, but it took him a while to gather up his courage, hehe. Honestly, if he'd waited any longer, I'd have made the first move myself.

I'm obviously biased, but Hero is ridiculously good-looking. And honestly, I'd love for you to meet him.
He gets flustered enough with just me around--I can only imagine how he'd react to two Maris flirting with him, hehe.
I think the two of us are gonna get along just fine, hehe... and you're right! A duet is always more fun than a solo performance... you'll help me out here, right?

Oh? Well, we'll have to see how the rest of to~background.time~ plays out... but now I'm certainly interested in getting to know each and every little thing about you, Mari~! I hope you'll show me a good time, hehe.

Hehe, thanks, Mari! It's really nice to hear you say that.
I'm honestly really glad you could join us to~background.time~--just having you here makes this place a whole lot brighter, you know? Especially with that smile of yours... has anyone told you how pretty it is?

Hehe... I'm looking forward to it, Mari~!
And, who knows... maybe I'll get to show you what I've got to offer too? I know I certainly wouldn't mind showing off for someone as cute as you...
Oh? My, I'd be more than happy to do a duet with you, ~adrien~! Two is always more fun than one, right?
Oh, no, Hero's definitely not the jealous type. And besides... we trust each other enough to move past those kinds of feelings. I'm pretty sure you understand what I mean, hehe.
Hehe, I'm looking forward to it... I just hope you can keep up~!
Well, I can't say I'd approve of it... but I bet she'd have a blast in more ways than one, hehe.
Her name's Aubrey. We lived in the same neighborhood growing up; my brother and I would hang out with her all the time. We were practically inseparable!

I can definitely understand that; I have to always look confident now, since that's what everyone expects of me...
But, that's why it's also important to always be prepared and adaptable: so you can be confident without having to fake it.

That's true... I have to always look confident now, since that's what most people expect of me.
Honestly, I probably would've cracked a long time ago if it weren't for my boyfriend, Hero...

Hehe, thanks! I really do want to impress everyone back home--especially my brother and our friends!
They really look up to me, and I don't want to let them down.
We keep in close touch with each other, of course! But phoning and writing home isn't the same as really being there for everyone.

I make sure to call and write back home whenever I get a chance! And a few of our friends are still back home with him, but... lately, things have gotten strangely awkward between them, and I can't figure out why.
I've never quite had time for that before, but... maybe I should. I'm sure there's one somewhere near my conservatory.
Maybe I should... But what do you mean by my fate changing? Was I supposed to die there, or something...?

Oh, don't I know it! But... being this daring and bold is thrilling, isn't it?
Nothing gets your heart pounding like baring it all to an audience, right? Driving them wild as you show off your stuff... hehe.

Sure thing! What did you want to ask, Amy?
Don't worry, I haven't forgotten what it's like to be a freshman, hehe.

Really, Amy, it's more like we're both fine with the other finding some fun on their own, since our schedules make it hard for us to get time together. Though... I don't think Hero would mind if I, say, sent him a picture of me kissing a cute girl, if that's what you're asking~!

I'm not typically the type to go out and upstage people or anything... I'm just saying that there are more ways to win someone's heart over than just using special powers. I'd love to show you how it's done... hehe.

I mean, I don't make a habit of upstaging people or anything... but I think there's far more interesting ways to win someone's heart over than just having a power do it for you. I'd be more than happy to demonstrate for you...

I wouldn't say I'm one-upping you. Really, I'm just saying there's far more exciting ways of drawing people in... of getting their attention and making them think of nothing but you, hehe. Perhaps I can demonstrate for you?
One-upping you? No, I wouldn't say that... I just think you can do better when it comes to getting everyone's eyes and minds on you and you alone. I'd be happy to demonstrate for you, hehe...
If I had to say... it's being able to share something with him. It's something we can enjoy together, you know?
Well, he likes making sandwiches. Like... he really, really likes sandwiches. And to be honest, I kinda picked up some of his tastes as well, hehe.

Hmm... To me, the most important thing is to just talk to your boyfriend, and make everything you're feeling clear to the two of you. But your boyfriend also has to do that too--which is why finding the right guy is important!

I think it's different for everyone, but... the most important thing, to me, is trust. Hero knows he can trust me with anything, no matter what, and I can do the same with him. That's why finding the right guy is important--it's not easy, trusting someone like that!
It definitely isn't easy to find someone who's just right for you. Though, if you want my advice... start with being regular friends first. That's what Hero and I did, after all.

Yeah! I'm sure there's someone out there somewhere who's just right for you--and it's not like there's any rush. It took Hero and I a few years to really get comfortable with each other... but once we did, the rest came naturally.
Of course I mean you, silly! Honestly, you remind me of Hero sometimes... hehe, it's no wonder I want to fuck you so badly.
My, how polite! Hehe... you really do remind me of Hero, in a way. No wonder you're such a turn-on for me... right now, the only thing I can think about is how much I want to fuck you, hehe.
It's definitely a nice thought... but right now, all I can think about is how much I want to tie you up tonight, hehe. I mean, if you're into that, of course?

Mhm, those nights are always fun... and come to think of it, you do remind me of Hero in that way, just a little bit. Hehe, that's probably why you turn me on so much... I'd love nothing more than to have you under my thumb tonight. If you're into that, of course.
Oh! So, Fina, I'm studying the piano, in particular--I've been playing it for years now, and it was a pretty natural choice to just keep going with it!
Oh, I've been studying the piano! It's been part of my life for years now... if we had a piano here, I'd be more than happy to play a song, for you. Maybe some other day...
Oh, I've been studying the piano. I've been playing it for years... though honestly, it's pretty stressful, sometimes.
You're right, it might be fun to try out some new styles--is there anything you'd recommend I try out first, ~critical_darling~?
Could I get you all started with something to drink, maybe? Well... let me get this bow tie off, first.
Perhaps I could get you all started with a drink, to~background.time~? Give me a moment to get this bow tie off, and I'll get your drinks straight away, hehe...
Maybe I could get you all started with something to drink, to~background.time~? Just let me get this bow tie off, and I'll get right on that, hehe...
Just let me slip these suspenders off...
Just need to slide this thing off... and then this one...

This next course is gonna be a real treat... don't be shy now--feel free to look!
Time to serve up another nice helping of Mari... hehe.

I guess I'll have to ditch these... I might not be serving food anytime soon, but I think I can still serve up something else for you all, hehe.
I suppose I should take off this nurse cap first... It might prove inconvenient as we get further into this examination.
Hehe... it's not like I needed this nurse cap anyways. One moment...
So, to begin this examination... I'll remove these lower garments, to prepare the legs and parts of the pelvic area for observation...
The first thing we need to do for this examination is remove this skirt, to allow direct observation of the thighs and hips beneath...
Hehe... with the skirt out of the way, we can proceed to removing the upper portions of this uniform. Watch carefully.
With the skirt no longer in play, we can now proceed directly to the upper half of this uniform. Watch carefully as I demonstrate how to remove it...
With the initial diagnostics out of the way, we can now start getting more detailed with this exam... starting with my chest.
Hehe... the next part of this examination will involve a very close-up inspection of my chest. For that, though, you'll need to be able to see what's under this bra...
The penultimate portion of this examination will focus primarily on my crotch and genitalia... be very careful now, as these areas are highly delicate and sensitive to touch...
Onto the penultimate part of this examination... this time, we'll be focusing on the crotch area. This will require me to remove my panties, of course, so allow me to go ahead first...
I guess I don't need these shoes. Just let me slip them off...
Just give me a second to slip out of these shoes...
I know you're not supposed to take off your gloves in a medical setting... But I'm pretty sure we can let that slide here, hehe.
I get the feeling I'm going to be... well, feeling my way around some sensitive places later, hehe. Might as well get these off now...

Really, Nadia, I just have a packed schedule--class, homework, studying, rehearsals for my performances and recitals, and even other things like helping out across campus. It's nothing you need to worry about, though!

What's wrong with music, Leon? It can be pretty fun and relaxing, you know... have you ever considered learning an instrument? It sounds like you could use a low-stress hobby, given how action-packed the rest of your life is.
I suppose I should get rid of this card first. Really, the only reason I was given this was so I could get into the building for my performance earlier...
Well, I don't exactly need this ID card anymore... I mean, the only reason I have this was so that I could get into the building to perform.
Honestly, I'm glad to get these heels off. Walking around with them gets tiring really quickly.
As nice as these heels are, I'm glad I can finally get out of them... I've had to do a lot of walking today.
Honestly, I'm glad this place doesn't have a dress code...
By the way, ~player~, what do you think of my outfit? Do you have an eye for sharp-dressed girls?
Oh, hang on...just let me unbutton this shirt so I can get to some things underneath...
Well, since you've all been so patient so far... I think you're entitled to a bit of a bonus this time around, hehe.
Hehe... Wearing this reminds me of all those summers I spent growing up. Beach trips, fireworks, spending time with everyone... everything was just so fun back then! Ah, so many memories...
It's a shame I don't get more chances to go out with a swimsuit like this... I can't even remember the last time I've had time for fun at the beach or anything like that!
I almost couldn't wait to get this off... I mean, I know the goal is to not strip--but I kinda wanted to show off my swimsuit, hehe.

Finally! I've been waiting to get this thing off.
As much as I'd like to win here... What's the point of wearing a swimsuit if you're not going to show off a bit?
As much as I like this swimsuit... I think it's time to kick things up a notch. I hope you all are watching, hehe.

I already told you what I'm wearing underneath this, right?
Well... are you ready to see it for yourself?
Hehe... my first thought was to ditch the bra next, but you know what? I think I'll switch things up a bit for today~!
Hehe... This almost makes me feel like a kid again. All those times I went to the beach, growing up... Ah, so many memories.
Hehe... This almost makes me feel like a kid again! Beach trips, fireworks, spending time with everyone... Summers were always super fun growing up. Ah, so many memories...
Right! Just let me loosen this, and unknot that, and...

So... loosen this... untie this... and...

Are you into classical music? That seems like something you'd definitely be into.

I know you're enthusiastic about literature, Yuri, but I'm sure someone like you has pretty specific tastes in music, too.
Maybe you like classical music? That sounds like you.

More than just being passionate, Yuri... you actually strike me as someone who's very sensual.
Someone who can immerse herself with all five of her senses, hehe.

You know, Yuri... you seem to be someone who's quite sensual.
You're the kind of person to enjoy immersing herself with all five senses, aren't you?
I have to ask, Kumatora... is spending your weekends playing strip poker a normal thing for you? Or is this just a special case?

Kumatora, you said you had... psi-powers, was it?
Er, you're not going to read my mind or anything, are you?
You've mentioned fighting a lot, Kumatora, but that can't be the only thing you do, right? What do you do in your downtime--well, besides strip poker, that is?
Honestly, Kumatora, you almost seem like you're in your element, here. Either that, or you're confident enough to hide any jittery feelings, hehe.
Hmm... are you the delinquent type, Kumatora? I can almost see it, but... you seem more responsible than that, I suppose. Or am I just completely mistaken?
This might be out of the blue, Kumatora, but... do you have a soft spot for animals, by any chance? I'm just guessing because of that friend I mentioned earlier.
This might be out of the blue, Kumatora, but... do you have a soft spot for animals, by any chance? I'm just guessing, based on how similar you are to a certain friend of mine.
Wow, you really are a motormouth, aren't you, Wikipe-tan? I'm surprised you haven't gotten tired yet, reading out all that stuff.

Wikipe-tan... you said you're here to write an article on this place... but I thought Wikipedia had rules against original research? At least, I keep seeing notices about it on some of the more obscure articles I look up...

So, Wikipe-tan... I know you're here for research and all, but surely you're interested in more than just that, right?
Are you looking for a particular kind of person, here? What's your type?

You say you're here for 'research', Wikipe-tan... but I'm sure even you have a type. So, has anyone here caught your eye?
...Is it me, perhaps? Hehe.
So... are you really just here for 'research', Wikipe-tan? I'm sure someone here's caught your eye, at least... is it me, maybe? I certainly wouldn't mind you looking, hehe...
Come to think of it, Wikipe-tan, how are the articles on classical music doing? I like to think I've learned a lot about it--maybe there's something I could contribute?
I'm almost afraid to ask, but... are there any articles about me, Wikipe-tan? I don't think I'm nearly significant enough to have one, but...
It sounds like you've done plenty of research on us, Wikipe-tan... but I want to learn more about you, now. What brought you to Wikipedia? How'd you become... well, you?
You know, Wikipe-tan... I really want to do some research on you now. For example, that dress of yours--it's really cute! Where'd you get the design for it?
So, Wikipe-tan... how about I do some research on you, for a change? For example... I'd love to learn how you got that distinctive look. You're really quite stunning, you know?
So, Wikipe-tan... have you been enjoying things so far? I hope I've helped fill in your 'article' with some fun memories, hehe.
Say, Wikipe-tan... do you accept contributions to your 'article'? I'd be more than happy to help fill you in with some new and exciting details... hehe.
Wikipe-tan... would you mind if I helped contribute to your 'article'? I'd love to fill you in with some fun details of my own... hehe.
By the way, Wikipe-tan... I hope I haven't been too overbearing, so far? I know I can be a bit bold with this stuff, but really, I just want you to have fun here!
You're really fun to chat with, Wikipe-tan... when I'm talking to you, I feel like I can be just a bit bolder than usual, hehe.
You've been really fun to play against, Wikipe-tan... something about you makes me feel like I can be bolder, when I'm with you, hehe.
You know, Komi-san, I've been watching you for a while. At first, you struck me as the 'cool, silent beauty'... but the looks I've seen across your face tell a different story, hehe.
You're quite fascinating, Komi-san. I don't think you've said a word this whole time, but... you can be incredibly expressive, too. You really wear your heart on your sleeve.
'Twisted Fate', hmm... that can't be your real name, can it? It's more like a stage name. And if that's the case... I wonder what you're not showing us.
So, Fate... you're obviously pretty cool, collected, and confident. I'm guessing you're the type to always have a handle on things... or am I wrong?
I figure you get this question all the time, but I might as well ask, Nadia: what's with the scars? You look like a patchwork.
You've been pretty upbeat and carefree so far, Nadia. There's not much that can bring your spirit down, huh?

state.text: So, Noire... looks like you're up for a rematch together with ~player~, hm? You excited?

So, Noire... it sounds like ~player~ invited you here? Interesting... was I not enough for you, ~player~? Even though I showed you everything?
Hehe... I'm just kidding, of course. I don't mind at all.
So, ~player~, it sounds like Noire knows you. I just keep seeing new parts to you... even beyond everything you showed me last time, hehe.

case.state: You're certainly quite flashy, Cat Noir... I suppose that just comes with being a superhero, hm? I hope you're not disappointed, getting stuck here with a girl as plain as me.
Just how elaborate is that suit of yours, anyways? You're not gonna keep us here all ~background.time~ while you strip down, right?
I'll admit, I didn't think I'd play strip poker with a superhero to~background.time~. Still, at least things won't get boring--not with someone as flashy as you around.
You're a bit quieter now that you're out of that suit, Adrien. I'm guessing that boldness was part of your superhero facade--or is that something your powers give you?
So, you live a dual life, Adrien? Superhero by night, average person by day... and here I thought my life was stressful! It must be hard to balance it all, right?
So, Adrien... what do you do when you're not out fighting evil? I'm guessing you have a day job or something.
Hmm... is there anything--or anyone--you're interested in here, Adrien? Or to put it simply... do you have a type? Or are you really happy with just anyone?
You seem happy to flirt with pretty much everyone, Adrien... but I'm guessing there's some stuff you think is particularly sexy. I wonder... do I happen to fit your type?
You obviously have a discerning eye for beauty, Adrien... and I wonder what you think of me. Do I get you all hot and bothered under the collar, or am I just not your type?
So, Adrien... it's pretty obvious you have eyes for ~marinette~, over there. I'm curious to know what you see in her.
So, Adrien, I'm guessing that ~marinette~'s your type... but what is that type, exactly? I'm wondering what you find sexy... and if I happen to fit that too, hehe.
You obviously have a discerning eye for beauty, Adrien... and I wonder what you think of me. Do I get you all hot and bothered under the collar, or do you only have eyes for ~marinette~?
I'm a bit curious, ~yuna~--how did you meet Megumi and Sachi? There has to be a story behind that, right?
Megumi, Sachi... it feels like you two have been staring at me a lot. Or rather, it seems like you're trying to stare into me, almost... why is that?
Hmm, you don't seem to have any small things left, ~yuna~. That's a shame--that outfit really suits you! Still, even without it... you're quite cute, you know.

Seems like you're all out of small stuff, ~yuna~. It's a shame, too--that outfit's really cute!
Though... the person beneath is even prettier, hehe.
So... not much left but the big stuff, hm, ~yuna~? You know, that outfit of yours is quite nice... but I think the person beneath is far more beautiful, hehe.
What brings you here of all places, Jim? You look more like the type to play poker for money instead of for clothes.
So, Jim... when you came here, were you thinking of finding others more your age? Or were you hoping to hang out with a charming younger lady, instead? Hehe...
Come to think of it, Jim... I haven't seen many people here that are your age. Isn't that a bit strange?
So, Jim... were you looking to meet a charming younger lady to~background.time~? Or were you hoping to meet someone more your age?
You have some very interesting tattoos, Jim... and, of course, I can see you're armed. Are you a soldier?
I have to say, Jim... I didn't expect to meet someone quite as grizzly as you to~background.time~, Jim. You find all kinds here, hm?
Jim, your life's pretty hectic, isn't it? Since you're here, you must get some downtime, but... does that happen very often? Or is life more often just non-stop action for you?
So, Jim, it sounds like you're busy pretty much all the time, right? Were you maybe looking for someone who could help you... unwind a bit, during your downtime? Hehe...
I can just imagine all of the pressure you're under, Jim... your life's pretty stressful, isn't it? Is there anything I can do to help you... relieve that tension, maybe? Hehe...
I don't mean to pry into your circumstances or anything, Jim, but... something tells me you're not, erm, taken at the moment. Is that right?

So, Stocking, I'm guessing you're like a food critic, when it comes to sweets. What kind of cookies do you like best? Chocolate chip? Snickerdoodles? Sugar cookies? Maybe I could bake something for you.
Honestly, Stocking, if I'd known I'd meet a girl with a sweet tooth like yours, I would've baked something before coming here. How do you like cookies? Do you like any particular flavors?
I know I've mentioned cookies, Stocking, but what other kinds of baked sweets do you like? I'd love to try some new recipes.

Stocking, I'm a bit curious: do you only care about just having lots and lots of sugar, or are flavors important too? For instance... are you particularly fond of caramel? Or peanut butter? Maybe vanilla, or cinnamon...?
I couldn't help but notice your dress, Stocking--I'm guessing you like the style? You look a bit like a doll, hehe.
You must have a pretty keen sense for fashion with that dress, Stocking... but have you ever thought about putting on a suit? A girl in a nice suit can be quite eye-catching, after all.
I can tell you have a pretty keen sense of fashion, Stocking... that dress is quite cute, after all. What do you think of my outfit, though? Do you happen to like girls in suits?
Stocking, you're quite... eccentric, to say the least. You must have a pretty interesting type--so what exactly is it that you look for in a person?
Stocking... you're really kinky, aren't you? Got any ideas on things Hero and I can try in the bedroom?
You've got a sister, right, Stocking? What's she like? Outgoing and extroverted, maybe? Are you the quieter one between the two of you?
So, Stocking... you have an interesting dynamic with Panty. I'm guessing she drags you around all over the place, huh?
So, Stocking, I can tell we're not super into each other... aside from looks, anyways. I have to wonder, though--what exactly is it that you're looking for? You obviously have a type, right?
What's it like being famous, Stocking? Does it keep you busy?
Hehe, you're pretty feisty, Natsuki. Reminds me of a friend... though, come to think of it, why'd you pick that specific color for your hair? You dyed it, correct?
So, Natsuki... you write poems, right? What exactly do you write about? I might be a musician, not a writer... but I can still appreciate artistry, hehe.

You're in a club, right, Natsuki? That sounds like fun! ...Say, do you have festivals or anything at your school? If I'm not too busy, I'd love to visit then... well, if that's okay with you, anyways.
So, Natsuki... if you're such a fan of manga, I'm sure you've seen more fanservicey stuff, yeah? What do you think of it?
So, Natsuki, you read tons of manga, right? And I'm absolutely certain you've gotten into the raunchier stuff... there's a lot of it out there, after all.
So, Natsuki... I'm sure someone who reads as much manga as you naturally dips into the lewd stuff too. After all, manga is literature... and erotic literature has a long history, hehe.

Oh! Um...
To the wind that guides me: when I'm exhausted... bless me with the strength to keep going forward...
So, Meia, you're interested in learning more about men, right? I'd say I have some experience there, with my boyfriend... any details you want to hear about? Lewd ones, maybe?

Meia, if you're interested in learning about men, I'd love to share some of my experiences... it's not often that I get to talk about how much I like riding my boyfriend until his legs practically turn to jelly beneath me, hehe.
Hey, Meia, since you're interested in learning about guys... I could help fill you in a bit, maybe? I've been with Hero for years now, after all--I could talk about him for hours, hehe.
I'm really surprised that a girl as anxious as you would go out to play strip poker, Mikan. I guess there's more to you than meets the eye... perhaps you're not as shy as you seem.
You're pretty obviously a big bag of nerves, Mikan... but something tells me you're not quite as shy as you seem. Perhaps there's more to you than meets the eye...

You know, Mikan, my initial impression was that you were here to learn how to open up to others... but something tells me that's not quite right. Perhaps you just like being the center of attention? I wonder...

My first thought was that you were here to learn to come out of your shell, Mikan... but something tells me you'd be more than happy to expose yourself, if asked. Maybe you just like being the center of attention? I wonder...
Something's a bit off with the way you speak, Fischl. Really... it's too fancy. Like you're trying too hard to sound eloquent. I wonder why that is?
You strike me as the imaginative type, Fischl. Do you read, by any chance?
What do you do back home, Fischl? I mean... are you a writer? Or an artist? Or maybe something else entirely?
So, Rosa... this is your first time tackling a challenge like this, right? Or am I mistaken?
Rosa, I've heard that you run some kind of avenue? What's it like?
You've been pretty quiet so far, Heris... I'm really curious to learn more about who you are now, hehe.
You're pretty quiet, Heris. Really, that just makes me even more curious about what you're like on the inside, hehe.
So, Heris, I think you mentioned you're here to decompress... so how have you been doing so far? I hope you're having a nice time here.

Now that you've had a bit of time to collect some data, Heris, I'm curious to know what conclusions you've reached.
Really, I just want to know what you think of me so far, hehe.
Looks like it's the cute scientist's turn again... hehe, tough luck, Heris.

So, a certain cute scientist's up again?
Hehe... sorry, Heris.
So... Misaka, you said you have sisters? What are they like? Are you close with them?
So, you're here to meet new people, right, Misaka? That's lovely... and I imagine watching them strip must be a nice little bonus for you too, hmm?
I expected a priestess to be more gentle and soft-spoken... but honestly, L'Arachel, you're probably one of the loudest and most dramatic people I've ever met. I wonder what's up with that.
I really have to wonder what a righteous, upstanding woman like you is doing here, L'Arachel. Really, isn't it a bit hypocritical to try and teach someone a lesson by stooping to their level?
Wait, what are you doing with your staff, L'Arachel...?
So, what brings you here, Aoba? Looking to unwind after a long day at work, perhaps?
Honestly, Miki, your enthusiasm's pretty infectious! I was hoping to find someone who wasn't afraid to have fun here... do you think you can keep up that energy, though?
I couldn't help but notice your physique, Miki... you're pretty well-toned. I take it you're an athlete of some kind?
I'm surprised that someone like you could be a shrine maiden, Reimu. You don't strike me as being particularly reverent... nor do you seem particularly diligent, for that matter.
So, Miko, where exactly are you from? It's not often I see someone dressed as regally as you are, hehe.
So, Tojiko, I take it you're going to be playing alongside your wife, then? That's great! The more the merrier, hehe.
So, wait, Polly, you're a high school student? That's surprising--you look more like a college student to me. What's up with that?

So, you're here to meet new people, right, Pyrrha? I'm just here to de-stress, myself--but I'm always happy to make new friends!
And of course, it's always a treat to meet a face as lovely as yours, hehe.
Hey, Leon, I'm pretty sure I saw a bar somewhere close by--maybe I could get you something? I'd love to buy you a drink to~background.time~, hehe.
Hey, Leon, there's a pretty well-stocked bar here... maybe I could buy you a drink to~background.time~?

Feel free to go slow if you're more comfortable with that, Mikan--I won't mind! I want you to have fun here, after all... though I definitely wouldn't say no if you wanted to be a bit more daring this time, hehe.

Hehe... what are you going to take off this time, Mikan? I kind of want to see a bit more... but I don't really want to pressure you, either!
Either way, I don't think I'll be able to keep my eyes off you, hehe.

Well, Mikan... you have my undivided attention. Don't keep your audience waiting~!
Honestly, I don't think I could keep my eyes off you even if I tried, hehe...

I'll admit... I'm interested in learning more about you to~background.time~, Mr. Secret Agent Man. It's not every day you get to meet someone whose entire being practically screams `action hero', after all... hehe.
Honestly, if I didn't know this place any better, Leon, I'd have guessed that you were a movie star. Everything about you screams `action hero', hehe... and you've certainly captured my attention.
So... you're part of an idol group, Saki? How on Earth did that happen? I can't imagine you as the type to sing that kind of pop music. Or dance around in frilly skirts, for that matter.

For someone literally born in hell, Charlie... you're surprisingly kind and sweet. How come?
Aren't demons supposed to be, you know, cruel and unforgiving?
So... wait a second, ~dark_magician_girl~. How exactly are you a Dark Magician Girl? I think you're wearing one of the brightest outfits here... not to mention you're pretty cheery and easygoing.
Not much further left to go... and here I thought you'd do better, Kyou. Then again, I guess you could say the same for me, hehe.

First the bottom, now the top, hm? Tsk, I thought you'd be better at this game, Kyou?
Then again, I'm kind of in the same boat... and I'm definitely curious to see what you're wearing under there.
Jeez, you're really not doing so well, Kyou... I thought you said you were good with cards?
Another layer down... so, what's coming off first, Kyou? Top or bottom? Don't be shy now... either choice is good, hehe.

Hehe... so, Kyou. Top or bottom first?
Personally, I think both choices are fine... after all, I get to see more of you either way, hehe.
I think I saw you shuffling around some papers earlier, Ganyu... did you bring your work here with you? Any reason why?
Say, Yuno... do you want to make a bet? You seem like the kind of guy who'd enjoy a little bit of extra zest in this game... and besides, luck is on your side, isn't it?

You're pretty confident in your luck, aren't you, Yuno?
Normally, I'd be a bit skeptical... but considering how undressed I am right now, I have to wonder if there's a bit of truth to it.
I, um... I don't mean to pry, Saki, but... are you taking care of yourself? Are you okay?
My... this is turning you on, isn't it Mikan? Watching me drink in your sexy little body, knowing you have me wrapped around your finger...
You really like this, don't you Mikan? Feeling my eyes on you, watching me take in all of your gorgeous curves and features... it's turning you on, isn't it?

I can tell you really like this, Mikan... all the attention I'm giving you. It turns you on, doesn't it? How lewd, hehe...
Don't worry. I'm more than happy to indulge you. I want to make you feel good, after all.
I'll admit, I didn't expect to meet someone as kind and sweet as you to~background.time~, Estelle! What brings you here, if you don't mind me asking?
You know, Estelle, I certainly didn't expect to meet someone as sweet as you here... or as fancy, for that matter. I wonder, what brings you here to~background.time~?
So... you're part of a Literature Club, Sayori? Hehe, it must be a pretty fun and cozy place with you around!
So... you're part of a Literature Club, Sayori? It sounds like lots of fun--and I bet you're the one who ties the whole group together, hm?
So, it sounds like you've known ~player~ here for a while, Sayori... how did that happen? Do you two go to school together?
It seems like you and ~player~ are pretty close, Sayori. Childhood friends, maybe?

Your hair's kind of a mess, Sayori... You must've really rushed to get here, huh?
Still... it actually looks pretty good on you, hehe.
Jeez, your hair's a bit of a mess, isn't it Sayori? I'm guessing you didn't have time to straighten it before you left... still, it's pretty charming, you know?
...Okay, I need to ask: What are you exactly, Kora? If I had to guess, I'd say that you were... I don't know, some kind of superhero? But that can't be right, can it...?
Ooo... I'll admit, I've been wondering what you've been wearing underneath those outer layers, Heris... hehe.
I'm actually really curious about what you wear underneath, Heris... I'm sure it's as cute as you are though, hehe.
So, Emi... I hear you do track? What kind of events do you do? Long distance? Sprints?
You're really into track, right, Emi? What kind of running do you do--marathons? Sprints? Something else, maybe?
You're pretty spirited, Emi... honestly, where do you get all that energy from? I know someone who could use it, hehe.
I have to wonder where you get all of that energy from, Emi... Hehe, I know a certain someone who could use a bit of your spirit.
Hey, Emi... got any tips for dealing with injured knees? I hurt my knee a few years back while playing softball, and it's never been the same since.

Come to think of it--do you have any tips for exercising with an injured knee?
I hurt one of my knees a few years back while playing softball, and it never really healed right, you see...
Hehe, you're one of the more bubbly people I've met around here, Emi... Are you always like this? Where do you get it from?
You're one of the more energetic people I've met here, Emi--are you always like this? Where do you get all of that energy from?
Jeez, you're pretty competitive, hm, Emi... I'm sure this'll be fun, though! It's been a while since I've had the time to play a game like this, hehe.
Well, aren't you competitive, Emi... I'm sure this'll make for an interesting game, hehe. It's been a while since I've been able to play a fun game like this, hehehe...
I'm just a bit curious, Mari... you wouldn't happen to have siblings too, would you? A younger brother, maybe? Hehe...

Going by the uniform, Mari... I'm guessing you just got out of class.
Is this how you normally spend your free time after school? Or is this just a special occasion?
You know, ~aqua_grunt~, I'm surprised you're willing to let people call you a grunt, of all things. Talk about devotion to the cause...
So, Amy... you're a singer, huh? You have a beautiful voice--do you practice often? It definitely sounds like you do, hehe.
You have an amazing voice, Amy--do you practice singing often? You definitely have a talent for it!

It sounds like you do a lot of writing with your club, Amy... what kind of stuff do you write?
Fantasy, maybe? You definitely seem like the imaginative type, hehe.

Hey, Amy...do you know any good places for finding spiders?
Like, say, if I wanted to sneak a spider into a certain someone's stuff...

So, funny story... I actually got a package full of bread the other day, from back home!
Oh, I'm friends with the twins who work at the bakery in my hometown--we still keep in touch, actually!
I hope Polly's doing okay back home... Oh! She's the caretaker for one of my friends back home. She's kind and sweet... and pretty cute too, hehe.

Oh! I just remembered, I need to call Polly back later--I think I missed a call from her earlier today...
Oh, we've actually been talking a fair amount!
Hey, Rosa, if you're up for it, would you mind showing me around Join Avenue? I'd love to see what you've brought to the place, hehe.
If you're free after this, Rosa... I was hoping I could visit Join Avenue. Maybe you could show me around?
You know, you really do have a lovely voice, Amy... I'd love to hear you sing some more for me tonight, hehe. Or... maybe we could do a duet, together?
You know, the more I talk to you, Amy, the more I want to learn about you. There's just something about you that keeps pulling me deeper and deeper into your web...

Hey, Amy... how easy is it to learn to sing?
Like, say... if you were to teach me how to sing tonight, just the two of us. I think we could have lots of fun together, hehe.

Hey, Mari, I mentioned my brother earlier, right? I was thinking... maybe I could introduce you to him sometime after this? I think you two would get along great!
And between you and me, I think he's a bit lonely back home.

Hmm, now that I think about it... Mari, would you be interested in meeting my brother after this? I bet you two would make great friends, hehe.
And between you and me... I think he could use some excitement in his life.

Mari, I mentioned before that I have a younger brother, right? I was wondering, maybe I could introduce you two after this?
I think you'd really like him! He's really fun to be around, even if he is a bit quiet.

So, Mari, I mentioned my younger brother earlier, right? I was thinking, maybe I could take you to meet him after this.
I think you two would make great friends! He's kinda shy, but he's still a lot of fun to be around.
So, Mari... are you free after this? My outfit's kinda plain, but perhaps you could help me pick out something more exciting after this?

Hmm... hey, Mari, do you want to hang out after this game?
I'm thinking of changing up my outfit, and I was wondering if you'd like to come along. I could use your input, hehe.
Hey, Mari... do you want to maybe hang out after this? There's a new piano piece I've been working on learning, and I was hoping I could play it for someone.

Hey, Mari, are you free after this game? If you are, I was thinking maybe we could hang out together.
I've been working on learning a new piano piece, and I was hoping for the chance to finally play it for someone!
So, Ahri... with your powers, I guess you can read me like an open book, huh? Though I bet you could do that even without any special powers, hehe.

Hmm... You're a bit of an interesting read, Ahri. You seem a bit controlled at first, but something tells me it wouldn't take much to make you lose yourself here. I wonder what you'll look like then...

You know, Ahri, at first I thought you were the type to keep everything under control... but now I get the feeling that you're on the verge of just going wild, hehe. I wonder if we'll see that to~background.time~?
Why so dour, Blake? We're all here to have fun and unwind--surely you can lighten up a bit?
You've been all quiet and serious so far, Blake... You should lighten up a bit! It'll be good for you, I promise!
It sounds like you have some pretty interesting friends, Anatoly. How'd you meet them? How long have all of you been together?
You know, Anatoly, there's no need to be so shy and nervous here. Stare all you want--I certainly wouldn't mind you looking, hehe.

Hmm... Hey, Supernova, what do you do in your spare time?
...You do get spare time, right? I mean, I can't imagine you spend all your time traveling and saving the day.

I imagine you practice using your powers all the time, right Supernova?
What kinds of things do you practice? Are there any neat portal tricks you've picked up recently?

Your life must be pretty hectic, Supernova. I spend a lot of my time helping people out with normal things, and that's stressful enough--I can't imagine having to deal with the kind of situations you do!
Does it ever get to you? Do you ever feel like... I dunno, pulling back just a bit?

Hey, Supernova... I imagine you must be pretty busy all the time, given everything that you do. How do you make time for things like hanging out with friends? Or is that something you have trouble with too?

So, Monika... you're the president of a literature club? What's that like?
I'm not actually part of any clubs at my conservatory--I mostly just spend all my time helping everyone else out with their own clubs.
So, Monika... it sounds like you know ~player~! I'm guessing you two are classmates? Or... clubmates? How long have you known each other?
By the way, Asuna... I noticed that ring on your finger. I'm curious... who popped the question? Was it you... or Kazuto? Hehe.
Hehe... I noticed that ring you're wearing, Asuna. So, I'm wondering: who popped the question, you or Kazuto? And how?

You know, Asuna, I'm pretty sure we're about the same age, but... you seem a lot more mature than most people I've met. Responsible, too.
I'm curious, do you happen to have a younger sibling?
